title: List Recommendation Global Rules
description: Following model is returned when the list Recommendations Global Rules operation responds.

preview.description: Container for Global Rules and Strategies in preview

displayName.description: The display name for the RecommendationGlobalRule.

priceType.description: The price type.  This is only valid when the condition requires a price type to be specified.  For example, a priceType is required for a condition with id notSpecifiedPriceType.

range.description: The price range used for evaluating the condition.  This is only valid when the condition requires a range to be specified.  For example, a range is required for a condition with id priceNotBetween.

items.description: Two numbers >= 0 with the first being lower than the second.  This represents a price range.

currency.description: The currency used for evaluating the condition.  This is only valid when the condition requires a currency to be specified.  For example, a currency is required for a condition with id priceGT.

id.description: The id of the condition.  This identifies the type of condition.  Some examples of condition ids are: notCurrentBrand, notSpecifiedCollection, priceNotBetween.

collection.description: The product collection.  This is only valid when the condition requires a collection to be specified.  For example, a collection is required for a condition with id notSpecifiedCollection.

locale.description: The locale used for evaluating the condition.  This is only valid when the condition requires a locale to be specified.  For example, a locale is required for a condition with id notSpecifiedBrand.

brand.description: The product brand.  This is only valid when the condition requires a brand to be specified.  For example, brand is required for the condition with id notSpecifiedBrand.

globalRules.description: This is a description of noProductsInCurrentBrand
This is a description of noProductsInCurrentCollection
This is a description of noProductsInCurrentPriceType

error.message: Unable to access Global Rules due to missing request and query.
